gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 117, Spurs 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Spurs, 117-115. Jarrett Allen led the way for the Cavaliers with 29 points and 16 rebounds, while Caris LeVert added 23 points (4-5 3pt. FG) and three assists in the victory. Victor Wembanyama tallied a team-high 24 points, 10 rebounds and five blocks for the Spurs in the losing effort. Wembanyama also notched his 100th block of the season. The Cavaliers win their third consecutive game as they improve to 21-15 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 5-30.
